Package ballester.gameworld.actions

Behaviour related classes

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    An Action, carried out by an actor (possibly to a target).
    ActionSequence
    Several actions can be put in an **ActionSequence** where the first action failing its completion condition is tested for pre-conditions and fired if possible.
    ActionSequenceTest

    Eat
